label: Annotate metagenome data
description: Assemble, bin, and annotate metagenomic sample data

group.label: Read file 1
group.desc: FASTQ or FASTA file of reads

group.label: Read file 2
group.desc: FASTQ or FASTA file of reads

group.label: Read file
group.desc: FASTQ, FASTA or H5 file of reads

parameters.label: Contig file
parameters.desc: Input set of DNA contigs for annotation

parameters.label: Output Genome Group
parameters.desc: Name of genome group into whcih the generated genome ids will be placed.

parameters.label: Don't index bins
parameters.desc: If set, don't index the generated bins solr. They will not be available for analysis through the PATRIC site.

parameters.label: Annotation recipe
parameters.desc: Specifies a non-default annotation recipe for annotation of bins

parameters.label: Viral nnotation recipe
parameters.desc: Specifies a non-default annotation recipe for annotation of viral bins

parameters.label: Output Folder
parameters.desc: Path to which the output will be written. Defaults to the directory containing the input data.

parameters.label: File Basename
parameters.desc: Basename for the generated output files. Defaults to the basename of the input data.

parameters.label: Force local assembly
parameters.desc: If set, disable the use of remote clusters for assembly

parameters.label: Force inline annotation
parameters.desc: If set, disable the use of the cluster for annotation

parameters.label: Perform viral binning
parameters.desc: If set, perform viral binning of any contings unbinned after bacterial binning

parameters.label: Perform viral annotation
parameters.desc: If set, perform viral annotation and loading of viral genomes into PATRIC database of any binned viruses

parameters.label: Perform bacterial annotation
parameters.desc: If set, perform bacterial annotation and loading of bacterial genomes into PATRIC database of any binned bacterial genomes

parameters.label: Assembler to use
parameters.desc: If set, use the given assembler
